issue.title: smartstore.naver.com

labels.name: A: Bug
labels.description: The issue is caused by a program bug

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://smartstore.naver.com/pluginkorea/products/10032644485](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsmartstore.naver.com%2Fpluginkorea%2Fproducts%2F10032644485) ### Comment > Can access product page from store front page(https://smartstore.naver.com/pluginkorea -> click any product), but refreshing or entering product url directly causes error. > Disabling all but HTTPS filtering didnt't work. > On Chromiun I don't see problems.
